item.description:
Spring is here and it's time again for Boston's sharpest Israeli hi-tech startup minds to get together at MIT this month to see, discuss and help three local startups.

April Presenters:
1) WebLayers - Guy Loewy - Co-Founder & CTO (@weblayers)
2) Cyber-Ark - Shlomi Dinoor - VP Emerging Technologies
(@cyberark)
3) Akiban - Ori Herrnstadt - Co-Founder & CTO (@YesSQL)

When & Where:
Tuesday, April 27th, 2010 @ 6:30PM
MIT Sloan
Building E51 - Room 335
Cambridge, MA 01890

Agenda:
6:30pm-7:00pm Networking & Intros (Pizza)
7:00pm-8:00pm Product Demos, Group Q&A, Voting
8:00pm-8:30pm Member Announcements & Networking

Looking to hire top Israeli talent?
Post free on the TechAviv Job Board

Flying to Israel?
Use our exclusive 10% discount on ELAL flights. (Code: "TEC")

Sponsorship Opportunities
Please email Gil or Yaron if you are interested or know somebody who is interested in sponsoring the Boston branch or global TechAviv Founders Club.

See you soon!

Gil & Yaron
@giljzim
@YaronSamid
@TechAviv
www.techaviv.com
item.name: TechAviv MA April 2010 Meetup
